dct_title_s: Map of Canada and part of the United States : compiled from the latest authorities, 1871
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures.; "Compiled and drawn by order of the Honorable C. Dunkin, Minister of Agriculture, under the superintendence of Andrew Russell, P.L.S. by Edwd. A. Mara, draughtsman &c."; "Leggo & Co., photo. steam-lith., Montreal."; Shows borders and railroads, including projected rails.
